channel.title: Ok this is weird and i need help now.... Idk what this error is
channel.description:
UNable to establish loopback connection has been happening on every source i download.... PLease help me
Loaded clipmap in 78ms. [8/14/12 9:41 PM]: Launching HyBriD PvP... [8/14/12 9:41 PM]: Exception in thread "main" [8/14/12 9:41 PM]: java.io.IOExcep tion: Unable to establish loopback connection [8/14/12 9:41 PM]: at sun.nio.ch.PipeImpl$Initializer.run(Unknown Source) [8/14/12 9:41 PM]: at sun.nio.ch.PipeImpl$Initializer.run(Unknown Source) [8/14/12 9:41 PM]: at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Me thod) [8/14/12 9:41 PM]: at sun.nio.ch.PipeImpl.<init>(Unknown Source) [8/14/12 9:41 PM]: at sun.nio.ch.SelectorProviderImpl.openPipe(Unknown Sour ce) [8/14/12 9:41 PM]: at java.nio.channels.Pipe.open(Unknown Source) [8/14/12 9:41 PM]: at sun.nio.ch.WindowsSelectorImpl.<init>(Unknown Source)
[8/14/12 9:41 PM]: at sun.nio.ch.WindowsSelectorProvider.openSelector(Unkno wn Source) [8/14/12 9:41 PM]: at java.nio.channels.Selector.open(Unknown Source) [8/14/12 9:41 PM]: at org.apache.mina.transport.socket.nio.SocketAcceptor.s tartupWorker(SocketAcceptor.java:162) [8/14/12 9:41 PM]: at org.apache.mina.transport.socket.nio.SocketAcceptor.b ind(SocketAcceptor.java:141) [8/14/12 9:41 PM]: at server.Server.main(Server.java:139) [8/14/12 9:41 PM]: Caused by: java.net.BindException: Cannot assign requested ad dress: bind [8/14/12 9:41 PM]: at sun.nio.ch.Net.bind0(Native Method) [8/14/12 9:41 PM]: at sun.nio.ch.Net.bind(Unknown Source) [8/14/12 9:41 PM]: at sun.nio.ch.Net.bind(Unknown Source) [8/14/12 9:41 PM]: at sun.nio.ch.ServerSocketChannelImpl.bind(Unknown Sourc e) [8/14/12 9:41 PM]: at sun.nio.ch.ServerSocketAdaptor.bind(Unknown Source) [8/14/12 9:41 PM]: at sun.nio.ch.ServerSocketAdaptor.bind(Unknown Source) [8/14/12 9:41 PM]: ... 12 more Press any key to continue . . .
And i been looking at the internet about this and I think my internet is not connecting to myself or some shit like that.
this is in my cmd Tunnel adapter isatap.Belkin:
Media State . . . . . . . . . . . : Media disconnected Connection-specific DNS Suffix . : Belkin
Tunnel adapter Local Area Connection* 11:

item.dc:creator: @deatharmy deatharmy
